name: GitHub Actions cache node_modules 最小
description: actions/cache を使った npm キャッシュ

files.template:
name: cache
on: [push]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: 18, cache: 'npm' }
      - run: npm ci
